issue.title: [CI] Prune defunct appveyor build setup
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7340](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7340). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We don't run rust, go, or C# on appveyor anymore so delete references to them in the appveyor build scripts.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7340?focusedCommentId=16990191) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
